thread.title: Facebook Fun: Pest Control Companies on ‘Bob’s Burgers’
thread.title_full: Facebook Fun: Pest Control Companies on ‘Bob’s Burgers’

title: Facebook Fun: Pest Control Companies on ‘Bob’s Burgers’
text:
Subscribe Facebook Fun: Pest Control Companies on ‘Bob’s Burgers’ A couple of recent links PCT has shared on Facebook include a look at pest control companies featured on ‘Bob’s Burgers’ and a link to the incredible story about a man surviving the Australian desert by eating ants. October 16, 2015 
Stay on top of the market with PCT’s social media updates, including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and more. Get your PCT news updates on-the-go by subscribing to PCT’s Twitter feed https://twitter.com/PCTMagazine . The feed includes the latest industry news, as well as links to audio and video files, and is a great way to keep updated on your mobile devices. Follow PCT on Facebook at www.facebook.com/pages/PCT-Magazine/90176769577 for news stories, PCT promotions and to network with more than 1,400 industry colleagues. A couple of recent links PCT has shared on these sites, include a look at pest control companies featured on ‘Bob’s Burgers’ and a link to the incredible story about a man surviving the Australian desert by eating ants. CLICK HERE to browse these and other postings on the PCT Facebook page. Related Podcast: Electronic Trap Monitoring October 16, 2015 
Nase, service manager at Moyer Indoor/Outdoor Pest Control, Souderton, Pa., discusses his and his company’s experiences using electronic trap monitoring. Read More
